option.name: updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".HistoryActivity">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" app:title="@string/menu_history" app:navigationIcon="?attr/homeAsUpIndicator" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvHistory" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingTop="8dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar" />
<!-- Empty state --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/emptyState" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar">
<ImageView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_chat" android:alpha="0.5" app:tint="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" android:contentDescription="@string/no_history" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/no_history" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" android:gravity="center" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvChat" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" android:clipToPadding="false" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/etInput" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Welcome View - shown when chat is empty --> <ScrollView android:id="@+id/welcomeView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:visibility="visible" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/etInput" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<!-- App Icon/Logo --> <ImageView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:contentDescription="@string/app_name" />
<!-- Welcome Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvWelcomeTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/welcome_title" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" />
<!-- Welcome Subtitle --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvWelcomeSubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/welcome_subtitle" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" android:gravity="center" />
<!-- Divider --> <View android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:background="?android:attr/colorAccent" />
<!-- Features Section Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="@string/features_title" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" />
<!-- Feature 1 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_1" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Feature 2 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="️" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_2" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Feature 3 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_3" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Feature 4 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_4" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Example Questions Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:text="@string/try_asking_title" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExample1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:padding="12dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:text="@string/example_question_1" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/colorAccent" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:drawablePadding="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExample2" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:text="@string/example_question_2" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/colorAccent" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:drawablePadding="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExample3" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:text="@string/example_question_3" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/colorAccent" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:drawablePadding="8dp" />
<!-- Chat History Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvHistoryTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:text="@string/history_title" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" android:visibility="gone" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" android:visibility="gone" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvNoHistory" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/no_history" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
<EditText android:id="@+id/etInput" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:background="@android:drawable/edit_text" android:hint="@string/input_hint" android:padding="12dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textColorHint="#808080" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnSend" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSend" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="@string/send_button" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/drawerLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Main content --> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<!-- Toolbar --> <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" app:title="@string/app_name" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvChat" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" android:clipToPadding="false" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/etInput" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar" />
<!-- Welcome View - shown when chat is empty --> <ScrollView android:id="@+id/welcomeView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:visibility="visible" app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/etInput" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" android:gravity="center_horizontal">
<!-- App Icon/Logo --> <ImageView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:contentDescription="@string/app_name" />
<!-- Welcome Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvWelcomeTitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="@string/welcome_title" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" />
<!-- Welcome Subtitle --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvWelcomeSubtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@string/welcome_subtitle" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" android:gravity="center" />
<!-- Divider --> <View android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:background="?android:attr/colorAccent" />
<!-- Features Section Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="@string/features_title" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" />
<!-- Feature 1 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_1" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Feature 2 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="️" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_2" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Feature 3 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_3" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Feature 4 --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:gravity="center" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:text="@string/feature_4" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorSecondary" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Example Questions Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:text="@string/try_asking_title" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="?android:attr/textColorPrimary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExample1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:padding="12dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:text="@string/example_question_1" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/colorAccent" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:drawablePadding="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExample2" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:text="@string/example_question_2" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/colorAccent" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:drawablePadding="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvExample3" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="12dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:text="@string/example_question_3" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="?android:attr/colorAccent" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_help" android:drawablePadding="8dp" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
<EditText android:id="@+id/etInput" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:background="@android:drawable/edit_text" android:hint="@string/input_hint" android:padding="12dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textColorHint="#808080" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/btnSend" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSend" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="@string/send_button" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
<!-- Navigation Drawer --> <com.google.android.material.navigation.NavigationView android:id="@+id/navigationView" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_gravity="start" android:fitsSystemWindows="true" app:headerLayout="@layout/nav_header" app:menu="@menu/menu_drawer" />
</androidx.drawerlayout.widget.DrawerLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="176dp" android:background="?attr/colorPrimary" android:gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivUserPhoto" android:layout_width="64dp" android:layout_height="64dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_default_avatar" android:contentDescription="@string/user_photo" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvUserName" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvUserEmail" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
<group android:checkableBehavior="single"> <item android:id="@+id/nav_new_chat" android:icon="@drawable/ic_add" android:title="@string/menu_new_chat" /> <item android:id="@+id/nav_history" android:icon="@drawable/ic_chat" android:title="@string/menu_history" /> </group>
<item android:title="@string/menu_other"> <menu> <item android:id="@+id/nav_sign_out" android:icon="@drawable/ic_logout" android:title="@string/sign_out" /> </menu> </item>
</menu>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Drawer Menu - Kannada --> <string name="menu_new_chat">ಹೊಸ ಚಾಟ್</string> <string name="menu_history">ಹಿಂದಿನ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಗಳು</string> <string name="menu_other">ಇತರೆ</string> <string name="sign_out">ಸೈನ್ ಔಟ್</string> <string name="open_drawer">ನ್ಯಾವಿಗೇಶನ್ ಡ್ರಾಯರ್ ತೆರೆಯಿರಿ</string> <string name="close_drawer">ನ್ಯಾವಿಗೇಶನ್ ಡ್ರಾಯರ್ ಮುಚ್ಚಿರಿ</string> <string name="history_title">ಇತ್ತೀಚಿನ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಗಳು</string> <string name="no_history">ಇನ್ನೂ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಗಳಿಲ್ಲ.\nನಿಮ್ಮ ಇತಿಹಾಸವನ್ನು ಉಳಿಸಲು ಚಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ!</string> <string name="delete_conversation">ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಯನ್ನು ಅಳಿಸಿ</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Drawer Menu - Kannada --> <string name="menu_new_chat">ಹೊಸ ಚಾಟ್</string> <string name="menu_history">ಹಿಂದಿನ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಗಳು</string> <string name="menu_other">ಇತರೆ</string> <string name="sign_out">ಸೈನ್ ಔಟ್</string> <string name="open_drawer">ನ್ಯಾವಿಗೇಶನ್ ಡ್ರಾಯರ್ ತೆರೆಯಿರಿ</string> <string name="close_drawer">ನ್ಯಾವಿಗೇಶನ್ ಡ್ರಾಯರ್ ಮುಚ್ಚಿರಿ</string> <string name="history_title">ಇತ್ತೀಚಿನ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಗಳು</string> <string name="no_history">ಇನ್ನೂ ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಗಳಿಲ್ಲ.\nನಿಮ್ಮ ಇತಿಹಾಸವನ್ನು ಉಳಿಸಲು ಚಾಟ್ ಮಾಡಿ!</string> <string name="delete_conversation">ಸಂಭಾಷಣೆಯನ್ನು ಅಳಿಸಿ</string> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Drawer Menu - Tamil --> <string name="menu_new_chat">புதிய அரட்டை</string> <string name="menu_history">முந்தைய உரையாடல்கள்</string> <string name="menu_other">மற்றவை</string> <string name="sign_out">வெளியேறு</string> <string name="open_drawer">வழிசெலுத்தல் டிராயரை திற</string> <string name="close_drawer">வழிசெலுத்தல் டிராயரை மூடு</string> <string name="history_title">சமீபத்திய உரையாடல்கள்</string> <string name="no_history">இதுவரை உரையாடல்கள் இல்லை.\nஉங்கள் வரலாற்றைச் சேமிக்க அரட்டை அடியுங்கள்!</string> <string name="delete_conversation">உரையாடலை நீக்கு</string> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources> <!-- Drawer Menu - Tamil --> <string name="menu_new_chat">புதிய அரட்டை</string> <string name="menu_history">முந்தைய உரையாடல்கள்</string> <string name="menu_other">மற்றவை</string> <string name="sign_out">வெளியேறு</string> <string name="open_drawer">வழிசெலுத்தல் டிராயரை திற</string> <string name="close_drawer">வழிசெலுத்தல் டிராயரை மூடு</string> <string name="history_title">சமீபத்திய உரையாடல்கள்</string> <string name="no_history">இதுவரை உரையாடல்கள் இல்லை.\nஉங்கள் வரலாற்றைச் சேமிக்க அரட்டை அடியுங்கள்!</string> <string name="delete_conversation">உரையாடலை நீக்கு</string> </resources>

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
